title: Impressions
description: Tracks when impressions are presented on a site, along with names, types, and counts.

displays.title: Displays
displays.description: Counts the number of times an impression item has been displayed to a visitor.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: Tracks the ID of an item in an impression array.

type.title: Type
type.description: Tracks the type of impression in an impression array.

selected.title: Selected
selected.description: Tracks when a given item in an impression array has been selected or clicked.
